short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate lead data import into your Private Pool for efficient workflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are technology company.We survey and interview insights show that 84% of frontline sales regularly search public networks for potential customers, and import them into the CRM. The main efficiency challenge is the rapid duplication check and addition of leads to the Private Pool. Addressing this, we created the Quick Grab tool to streamline the process.The function of this plug-in is that the user in the process of browsing the target page through the browser program, through the plug-in program to initiate a page screenshot request, the plug-in will pass the request to the background for analysis and analysis through the interface, the sales can also manage their own crm background through the plug-in real-time, control import or delete, in a word, This plug-in is for the company's sales to improve work efficiency.
Alibaba's internal tools are a collection of sales-related tools. Non-company employees are not allowed to download them, and we will not provide any services to the outside world.
